ThingDef.label: crematorium module
ThingDef.description: Upgrade module for underground vault terminal which vaporizes selected things with extremely high temperatures.\n\nCan be used by cemetery vault. Will destroy body inside sarcophagus and sarcophagus itself (if made of flammable material).

ThingDef.label: deep drill module
ThingDef.description: Upgrade module for underground vault terminal which allows to drill deep-crust to create a new vault floor.\n\nEach additional module reduces the construction time of floors.

ThingDef.label: storage efficiency module
ThingDef.description: Upgrade module for underground vault terminal which allows to reorganize vault floor to increase it capacity.\n\nEach additional module increases the maximum floor level for the upgrade. Each floor upgrade increase it capacity by x2.

ThingDef.label: AI module
ThingDef.description: Upgrade module for underground vault terminal which allows terminal to work autonomously.\n\nRemoves requirement of operator to work. Allows to self eject a colonist out of cryptosleep casket on platform.

ThingDef.label: platform speed module
ThingDef.description: Upgrade module for underground vault terminal which accelerates platform movement.\n\nEach additional module reduces time for platform movement between surface and vault by x2.

ThingDef.label: platform efficiency module
ThingDef.description: Upgrade module for underground vault terminal which increase platform capacity.\n\nIncrease platform capacity by amount of modules.
